Class Inventory

public class Inventory extends Object

    • addNewMedicine

      public boolean addNewMedicine(String name, int amount, int level)
      Adding new medicine to the inventory when data is available to pass in
      Parameters:
      name - name of medicine
      amount - amount of medicine
      level - low level alert
      Returns:
      true if successfully added. false when it is already present in the inventory and not added in
